message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with real-time motion detection in non-stationary scenes, which is a problem commonly addressed in computer vision (cs.CV) and robotics (cs.RO). The proposed method utilizes optical flow, which is a common technique in multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) fields. The paper also mentions a dual judgment mechanism, which involves making decisions based on adaptive intervals and thresholds, indicating a possible connection to machine learning (cs.LG).
